00045 void rna_EditBone_align_roll(EditBone *ebo, float no[3])
00046 {
00047     ebo->roll = ED_rollBoneToVector(ebo, no, FALSE);
00048 }
00049 
00050 float rna_Bone_do_envelope(Bone *bone, float *vec)
00051 {
00052     float scale = (bone->flag & BONE_MULT_VG_ENV) == BONE_MULT_VG_ENV ? bone->weight : 1.0f;
00053     return distfactor_to_bone(vec, bone->arm_head, bone->arm_tail, bone->rad_head * scale,
00054                               bone->rad_tail * scale, bone->dist * scale);
00055 }
00056 
00057 #else
00058 
00059 void RNA_api_armature_edit_bone(StructRNA *srna)
00060 {
00061     FunctionRNA *func;
00062     PropertyRNA *parm;
00063 
00064     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "align_roll", "rna_EditBone_align_roll");
00065     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Align the bone to a localspace roll so the Z axis "
00066                                     "points in the direction of the vector given");
00067     parm = RNA_def_float_vector(func, "vector", 3, NULL, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, "Vector", "", -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX);
00068     RNA_def_property_flag(parm, PROP_REQUIRED);
00069 }
00070 
00071 void RNA_api_bone(StructRNA *srna)
00072 {
00073     PropertyRNA *parm;
00074     FunctionRNA *func;
00075 
00076     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "evaluate_envelope", "rna_Bone_do_envelope");
00077     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Calculate bone envelope at given point");
00078     parm = RNA_def_float_vector_xyz(func, "point", 3, NULL, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, "Point",
00079                                    "Position in 3d space to evaluate", -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX);
00080     RNA_def_property_flag(parm, PROP_REQUIRED);
00081     /* return value */
00082     parm = RNA_def_float(func, "factor", 0, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, "Factor", "Envelope factor", -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX);
00083     RNA_def_function_return(func, parm);
00084 }
